headline: Looking At The Narrative For Northrop Grumman NOC After Shifting Street Views On Growth And Returns
summary: The fair value estimate for Northrop Grumman has been adjusted slightly to about US$665 per share from roughly US$663, with the discount rate now set at about 8.00% and revenue growth assumptions at roughly 5.45%. These small tweaks reflect how analysts are weighing clearer growth visibility and funding support for key programs, while also considering questions around future capital returns and evolving policy risk. Investors can follow these kinds of incremental shifts to avoid being...
